issue.title: third party validation - the screen does not reflect spec.
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

The specifications for the third party validation screen was accepted as follow :
https://forge.easysdi.org/attachments/download/680/7_gliffy_validation-screens.png

The coded screen does not look like this :

- columnm order is different
- the toggle "done / to do" is replaced by a list of status (9 different status !)
- the link on the name of the request to see orders' details is missing
- the two button at the end of the list is merged in one button "Action"

Why ?


**Fixed versions :** 4.3.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Corrections done, I am OK with them.
